name: Drag Race FRVR - Hit the Gas!
name_original: Drag Race FRVR - Hit the Gas!
description:
Challenge your friends and beat them in exciting drag races to become the best dragster driver of all time. Show your piloting skills and tap the screen in the right moment to shift up gears and overtake your rivals! Improve your car by upgrading the engine, increasing the power of the nitro or adding the best tires to better adherence. Use the nitro to boost your speed, go full throttle and burn the wheels to reach the top speed of your car. Only this way you can win all rounds and prizes in this dragster game. Ready? GO!

You're at the starting line and the engines are primed and ready for action. Your opponent is experienced and looks serious about winning. There's only one thing to do – keep your cool and get in gear or this driver is going to leave you in the dust! Win all the dragster duels to double the reward in each race and earn enough money to get the Shift Engineer sportscar, the Desert Champion tank or even the Elite Racer speedcar!

Drag Race FRVR puts your skills to the ultimate test. Only perfect timing will get you over the finish line first where you'll be able to collect the prize. Are you up for a wager? You can double up your winnings by entering and winning the next race, or choose to collect the cash and use it to gear up your ride. Go head-to-head against your friends or random drag racers, beat them while driving their own cars and be the top 1 dragster pilot of the world ranking! Climb the leaderboards and immortalize your name in the Hall of Fame!

This is an engaging and fast paced car racing game since you only need 5 secs to start playing.
You can race in exciting daily or weekly tournaments or play solo to practice and sharp your driving skills. Easy to play but hard to master, let the engine revolutions increase and reach the maximum speed of your car in every drag track. What’s your top speed? Show off your highest speed mark with your friends and prove you are a real pro driver!

As you gain experience, points, and prizes, your options increase and the better equipped you'll be. Choose your preferred car and decide whether you want to power up wheels, engine, or fuel to gain a winning edge for the next race. Are you ready? Then put the pedal to the metal and show that other driver who the real winner is!

Drag Race FRVR is the perfect dragster game for highly intelligent savvy drivers. Get your engine rpms ready and drop the clutch when the bar is over the green, then shift up gears and go full throttle to win the drag competition!

Work your career from humble origins to pro by racing in the best dragster competitions all over the world. Find the right balance of accelerator and clutch and master the timing of each race to reach the top of the drag racing rank. Play for free the #1 drag racing game, compete in dragster races and start your supercar collection now!

Drag Race FRVR is a low storage game, you don’t need more than 30 mb to play! This free drag racing game only focuses on giving you a truly fun experience in a low mb game for free. It’s an easy to play dragster game with incredibly addictive and simple controls, so both young and adults can have fun. Play online or offline, since you don’t need an internet connection to play this dragster racing game. And relax, you can play as much as you want, there’s no time limit!
